name: 6th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science
content: 6th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science (BIOEN 2023) January 21-22, 2023, Virtual Conference https://bioen2023.org/ Scope 6th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science (BIOEN 2023) aims to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on recent systems and techniques in the broad field of Biomedical Engineering Topics of interest • Biomedical Electronics • Clinical BioChemistry • Biomechatronics • Biomaterials • Biophysics • Biomechanics of Injury and Wound Healing • Bionics • Cellular, Tissue and Genetic Engineering • Medical Engineering Systems & Applications • Biomedical Intelligence & Clinical Data Analysis • Orthopedic Bioengineering • Rehabilitation Engineering • Systems Physiology • Bionanotechnology • Bioinformatics of Diseases • Bioinstrumentation • Neural Engineering • Toxicology • Immunology • Social and Preventive Medicine • Sport and Exercise Medicine • Injury Prevention and Health Protection • Medical Robotics • Computational Systems Biology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by December 31,2022\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES)(Confirmed). Important Dates Submission Deadline : December 31,2022 Authors Notification : January 12, 2023 Registration & camera – Ready Paper Due: January 15, 2023 Contact Here's where you can reach us: bioen@bioen2023.org (or) bioenconf@yahoo.com Submission link: https://bioen2023.org/submission/index.php
